definition: "to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content

sentences.english: Love is the smile had to drink the poisoned wine, Later he was driven, never regret.
sentences.chinese: 愛情原來是含笑飲毒酒，肝腸寸斷，永不言悔。

sentences.english: Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
sentences.chinese: 即真主的衆僕所飲的一道泉水，他們將使它大量湧出。

sentences.english: With flavor and aroma of baking, after drinking halls.
sentences.chinese: 帶焙火的韻味與香氣，飲後令人回味無窮。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究薑桂飲膠囊抗心肌缺血的生化機理。

sentences.english: A few years mellowing, this wine becomes eminently drinkable.
sentences.chinese: 再經過一些年的醇化，這酒變得非常易飲。

sentences.english: I know, it gets cold so quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我可以如此靠飲動物的血活命嗎？

sentences.english: Admire everyone's beauty freely, and drink in the perfume of Spirit that is all around you.
sentences.chinese: 自在的欣賞每一個人的美，飲下環繞著你的靈性芬芳。

sentences.english: Is it at all possible that he alone can drink ten bottles of beer?
sentences.chinese: 難道他真的能獨個兒飲十瓶啤酒嗎？

sentences.english: Most scholars claim daily drink no more than 60 degrees liquor 25 ml.
sentences.chinese: 多數學者主張每日飲60度白酒不超過25毫升。

sentences.english: Who eat fruits and drink fruit juice.
Should we make a reservation if we are going to have morning tea tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 如果我們明天來飲早茶需不需要預訂？

sentences.english: The latter available five disperse or five skins fragrant drinks.
sentences.chinese: 後者可用五荃散或五皮飲。

sentences.english: I. The smoke-quitting product Habit-breaking Drink for Smokers provided by Party A shall be qualified products.
sentences.chinese: 甲方確保提供的君益忘煙飲戒菸產品爲行貨正品。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the effect and investigate the possible mechanism of Sujin Kangxian decoction on the treating pulmonary interstitial fibrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討蘇金抗纖飲治療肺間質纖維化的作用和機制。

sentences.english: Run to the dry, cold drink ban.
"Teaching" is to drink dishes in family education.

definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
to have tea and refreshments/to have dimsum lunch (Cantonese)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
